channel.title: Name of spells/attack style?

item.description:

spells----
click the spell for varrockand on the run.bat it should say something likeâ€¦
case 185 bob :action button 4140 (if you clicked varrock)

open text handler
search for this

Teleporting Spell", 1300);

then see this

p.sendQuest("@gre@Teleporting Spell", 1300); p.sendQuest("@whi@", 1301);
change the teleportion spell to like home (will not aactually work but you asked for changing names)
